flavorText: With a steady diet of lawbreakers, Azorius griffins inevitably develop a resistance to the contraband magic that taints much of their prey.

foreignData.flavorText: Da Gesetzesbrecher immer wieder auf ihrem Speiseplan stehen, entwickeln die Greifen zwangsläufig Abwehrkräfte gegen die Schmugglermagie, von der ihre Beute durchdrungen ist.
foreignData.name: Elite-Geschwader der Azorius

foreignData.flavorText: Con una dieta estable a base de delincuentes, los grifos azorios inevitablemente desarrollan una resistencia a la magia de contrabando que corrompe a sus presas.
foreignData.name: Ala principal azoria

foreignData.flavorText: Grâce à leur régime constant de criminels, les griffons d'Azorius développent une résistance à la magie de contrebande qui souille leurs proies.
foreignData.name: Première aile d'Azorius

foreignData.flavorText: Grazie a una rigida dieta a base di fuorilegge, i grifoni Azorius sviluppano una forte resistenza alla magia di contrabbando che contamina le loro prede.
foreignData.name: Primo d'Ali Azorius

foreignData.flavorText: アゾリウスのグリフィンは、犯罪者を日常的に餌にすることにより、必然として餌食にかけられた禁制の呪文に対する抵抗力を得ている。
foreignData.name: アゾリウスの一番翼
foreignData.text: 飛行、プロテクション（エンチャント）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — グリフィン

foreignData.flavorText: Com uma alimentação regular baseada em infratores, os grifos Azorius desenvolvem uma inevitável resistência às mágicas clandestinas que contaminam muitas de suas presas.
foreignData.name: Primeira-Asa Azorius

foreignData.flavorText: Поскольку грифоны Азориусов постоянно питаются нарушителями закона, у них вырабатывается устойчивость к магии, которой подпорчены многие их жертвы.
foreignData.name: Первокрыл Азориусов

foreignData.flavorText: 由于可供俄佐立狮鹫果腹的违法之徒数量十分充足，它们自然而然地发展出反制其猎物身上违禁法术的本事。
foreignData.name: 俄佐立先锋

name: Azorius First-Wing

rulings.text: “Protection from enchantments” means that Azorius First-Wing can’t be enchanted, it can’t be targeted by Aura spells or by abilities of enchantments, all damage that would be dealt to it by enchantments is prevented, and it can’t be blocked by creatures that are also enchantments.
If an effect tries to move an Aura onto this creature, the effect will fail and the Aura will stay where it was.
Azorius First-Wing doesn’t have protection from creatures that are enchanted.
